name: Type: Internal Refactor or Cleanup
description: Refactors or formatting fixes (PR only) (don't use this for typos or grammar mistakes)

name: Priority #4: Critical (Blocker)
description: This issue or pull request needs to be finished before more work can be done

name: Status #1: Requested
description: This issue or pull request needs to be reviewed and approved or rejected by a collaborator

name: Status #2: In Review
description: This issue or pull request is currently being reviewed by a collaborator

name: Status #2: In Review (Needs more info)
description: More info by the issue or pull request creator is needed

name: Status #3: ToDo
description: This issue or pull request was approved and needs to be worked on

name: Status #4: In Progress
description: This issue or pull request is currently being worked on

name: Status #5: Resolved - Done
description: This issue or pull request is finished

name: Status #5: Resolved - Won't Do
description: This issue or pull request will not be worked on

name: Status #5: Resolved - Won't Do (Duplicate)
description: This issue or pull request already exists
